def diff(arr, n: int, axis: int = 0):
    import numpy as np
    """
    difference of n between self,
    analogous to s-s.shift(n)
    
    Parameters
    ----------
    arr : ndarray
    n : int
        number of periods
    axis : int
        axis to shift on
    
    Returns
    -------
    shifted
    """
    na = np.nan
    dtype = arr.dtype
    
    if arr.dtype == bool:
        # Convert boolean array to integer to perform subtraction
        arr = arr.astype('int')
    
    if n > 0:
        out_arr = np.empty(arr.shape, dtype=dtype)
        out_arr[:n] = na
        out_arr[n:] = arr[n:] - arr[:-n]
    else:
        out_arr = np.empty(arr.shape, dtype=dtype)
        out_arr[n:] = na
        out_arr[:n] = arr[:n] - arr[n:]
    
    return out_arr
